--- In junit@y..., "jays81" <jays81@y...> wrote:
> hi,
> 
> I am new to this junit testing. I am trying to test void methods. 
> What is the best way of doing this.
> 
> e.g i am testing a method:
> 
> void dispatchEvent(Event event)
> 
> which inside calls handleEvent(event) , in a class called Handle 
> (this is also a void method)
> 
> thanks

The first time I want to do this for an object I self-shunt it.  If 
another TestCase needs the same shunt I MockObject the shunt by 
extracting class.

http://www.junit.org/news/article/patterns/index.htm

Erik Meade
http://junit.org
